name: Star Wars: Order 66 (Downloadable)
description:
This is my Downloadable edition of my HTML Version: 

HTML: https://suraj-animations.itch.io/star-wars-order-66

Updated to version 0.2 - Fixed bugs, map changes, faster animation transitions

Warning: Game Contains Violence and Gore

Re-enact Order 66 from Star Wars: Revenge of the sith, and slice-and-dice some innocent Jedi Padawans! The goal of the game kill as many children as you can in 60 seconds, all inside the metroidvania-styled jedi temple. Press R to restart and Escape to go to the Menu.  For all the people who wanted an Order 66 game, your dream is now a reality!

Game is still in development stages, so if you encounter any bugs, please leave a comment down below or message me directly. The final update will come soon.
